channel.title: DG Pr0 - 1 step, demolish everyone in my path!
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]DG Pr0 - 1 step, demolish everyone in my path![/size] [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/326/dgpr0.png[/img] [img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/326/dgpr0.png[/img][/center] [center][size=24pt]Table of Contents[/size][/center] [ul][li]Introduction[/li] [li]DG Pr0: My Goal[/li] [li]My LVL Goals[/li] [li]Recent Achievements[/li] [li]Dungeoneering Videos[/li] [li]Conclusion[/li][/ul] [s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=24pt]Introduction[/size] Hello, I am the owner of District CLI and this account DG Pr0. I am gonna show you my secret account I was making. Check it out!
DG Pr0: Arham 4 is very nice to me, but he does make me go in too many battles >.>. Why doesn't the freaking guy do it himself, because he is a big fat scaredy cat! He is such a loser. I mean...
Okay, shut up now DG Pr0, let's get to your topic. Now...
DG Pr0: Yeah, my topic! To bad you don't have a topic! Noob!
Just shut up now. Any ways, now let's get back to the topic. Let's continue shall we?
DG Pr0: No, we shall not until you apologize for saying shut up to me >.>
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=24pt]DG Pr0: My Goal[/size]
My goal is to pwn ALL dungeons. I will rip the heart of any boss that is in my way! I will use my 2h the cripple the heart of everyone! GL, cause you all are going down!!!!!!!
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=24pt]My LVL Goals[/size] Current/Minimum/Maximum ======================= Green = Finished Completely -- Orange = Finished Minimum Attack: 45/45/45 Strength: 60/60/80 Defence: 3/1/1 Ranged: 51/60/80 Magic: 3/1/1 Prayer: 1/1/1 HP: 53/57/76 Combat: 52/49/60 [s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=24pt]Recent Achievements[/size] [IMG]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/7161/dgpr0achievement.png[/img] [s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=24pt]Dungeoneering Videos[/size] Coming soon... [s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=24pt]Conclusion[/size] Thanks for reading my pures profile! Cya!
DG Pr0: Thanks and cya!
For more info, please read [url=http://forums.zybez.net/topic/1514262-adungeonguy-the-new-f2p-dungeoneering-range2h/]this[/url] as this is remaking that account as that account got its defence up way too high.

item.title: DG Pr0 - 1 step, demolish everyone in my path!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:13, topic:437928”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=540644.msg3959728#msg3959728 date=1333157836]

Why 45atk?
40 is rune f2p / brine sabre p2p
why the hell get an extra cb level for 45?

Because Gravite 2h is 45 attack. This is dungeoneering pure, meaning it aims for gravite 2h.
[/quote]
Ive been to long gone from the game ^^
never heard of some gravite thing[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: DG Pr0 - 1 step, demolish everyone in my path!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:7, topic:437928”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=540644.msg3959668#msg3959668 date=1333151555]

Lol?

No that wasn’t a joke nor a troll. It was a question, I mean, it’s uncommon for people to have a conversation with themselves (pretending they’re another person) and since it’s a runescape committee and Sparc Mac is famous and he talks to himself, I would expect you to have the same Idea. Especially since you pretty much said the same exact things just a different name being used.
[/quote]
I did? I made these up and thought it would make the topic entertaining :P.[/quote]
Well now you know :b, I felt like I came across mean, no mean was intended xD

Read full topic

item.title: DG Pr0 - 1 step, demolish everyone in my path!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[center][size=24pt]DG Pr0 - 1 step, demolish everyone in my path![/size]

[/center]

[center][size=24pt]Table of Contents[/size][/center]

[ul][li]Introduction[/li]
[li]DG Pr0: My Goal[/li]
[li]My LVL Goals[/li]
[li]Recent Achievements[/li]
[li]Dungeoneering Videos[/li]
[li]Conclusion[/li][/ul]

__________________________________________________________________________

[size=24pt]Introduction[/size]

Hello, I am the owner of District CLI and this account DG Pr0. I am gonna show you my secret account I was making. Check it out!

DG Pr0: Arham 4 is very nice to me, but he does make me go in too many battles >.>. Why doesn't the freaking guy do it himself, because he is a big fat scaredy cat! He is such a loser. I mean...

Okay, shut up now DG Pr0, let’s get to your topic. Now…

DG Pr0: Yeah, my topic! To bad you don't have a topic! Noob!

Just shut up now. Any ways, now let’s get back to the topic. Let’s continue shall we?

DG Pr0: No, we shall not until you apologize for saying shut up to me >.>

__________________________________________________________________________

[size=24pt]DG Pr0: My Goal[/size]

My goal is to pwn ALL dungeons. I will rip the heart of any boss that is in my way! I will use my 2h the cripple the heart of everyone! GL, cause you all are going down!!!!!!!

__________________________________________________________________________

[size=24pt]My LVL Goals[/size]

Current/Minimum/Maximum

Green = Finished Completely – Orange = Finished Minimum

Attack: 45/45/45
Strength: 60/60/80
Defence: 3/1/1
Ranged: 51/60/80
Magic: 3/1/1
Prayer: 1/1/1

HP: 53/57/76
Combat: 52/49/60

__________________________________________________________________________

[size=24pt]Recent Achievements[/size]

__________________________________________________________________________

[size=24pt]Dungeoneering Videos[/size]

Coming soon…

__________________________________________________________________________

[size=24pt]Conclusion[/size]

Thanks for reading my pures profile! Cya!

DG Pr0: Thanks and cya!

For more info, please read this as this is remaking that account as that account got its defence up way too high.

Read full topic
